title: A Long Way Home
prompt:
In the story, the ant thinks, "It's so far." Have you ever felt that something you wanted was far away or hard to reach?

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What was the goal?
2) What did you do?
3) How did you feel (or what happened in the end)?
hint:
Ideas: a dream, a place, an exam, a fitness goal.
Sentence starters: My goal was ____. / I worked on it by ____. / In the end, I felt ____.
sample: My goal was to pass an important exam. I studied a little every day and didn’t give up. In the end, I felt proud of my progress.

ja.prompt:
物語の中で、アリは「It’s so far.（とても遠い）」と感じます。あなたも、目標が遠く感じたことはありますか？

英語で3文：
1) 目標は何でしたか？
2) 何をしましたか？
3) 最後どうなりましたか？（または気持ち）
ja.hint:
例：夢／行きたい場所／試験／目標。
型：My goal was ____. / I worked on it by ____. / In the end, I felt ____.
ja.sample: My goal was to pass an exam. I studied a little every day and didn’t give up. In the end, I felt proud.

zh.prompt:
故事裡，小螞蟻覺得「回家好遠」。你有沒有覺得自己想要的東西或目標「離自己很遠」的時候？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你的目標是什麼？
2) 你做了什麼？
3) 最後結果或你的感受是什麼？
zh.hint:
方向：夢想／想去的地方／考試／一個目標。
句型：My goal was ____. / I worked on it by ____. / In the end, I felt ____.
zh.sample: My goal was to get into a good school. I studied every day and kept trying. In the end, I felt more confident.

title: I Have an Idea
prompt:
The ant says, "I have an idea" and tries a new way to cross. Think about a time you had a problem and tried a new idea.

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What was the problem?
2) What idea did you try?
3) What happened in the end?
hint:
Ideas: school, home, travel, friends.
Sentence starters: I had a problem because ____. / I decided to ____. / In the end, ____.
sample: I had a problem because my bus stopped running. I used a map app and walked a new route home. In the end, I found a nice park on the way.

ja.prompt:
アリは「I have an idea.」と言って、新しい方法を試します。あなたが困って、新しいアイデアを試したことはありますか？

英語で3文：
1) 問題は何でしたか？
2) 何をしましたか？
3) 最後どうなりましたか？
ja.hint:
場面：学校／家／外出／友達。
型：I had a problem because ____. / I decided to ____. / In the end, ____.
ja.sample: I had a problem because my bus stopped running. I used a map app and walked home. In the end, I got home safely.

zh.prompt:
小螞蟻說「我有一個主意」，然後試著用新的方法過去。想一想，你有沒有遇過問題，必須想出新點子？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 問題是什麼？
2) 你用了什麼方法？
3) 最後結果如何？
zh.hint:
情境：學校／家裡／出門／朋友。
句型：I had a problem because ____. / I decided to ____. / In the end, ____.
zh.sample: I had a problem because my phone battery was low. I asked a shop for help and charged it for a while. In the end, I could call my family.

title: Jump and Try
prompt:
The ant shouts "Jump!" and tries something new, even though he is not sure what will happen. What is something new you would like to try, even if you feel a little nervous?

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What do you want to try?
2) Why do you feel nervous?
3) What small step can you take first?
hint:
Ideas: a sport, a hobby, speaking English, traveling.
Sentence starters: I want to try ____. / I feel nervous because ____. / My first small step is ____.
sample: I want to try giving a short presentation in English. I feel nervous because I might make mistakes. My first small step is to practice for five minutes a day.

ja.prompt:
アリは「Jump!」と言って、新しいことに挑戦します。少し不安でも、あなたが挑戦したいことは何ですか？

英語で3文：
1) 何を試したいですか？
2) なぜ不安ですか？
3) 最初の小さな一歩は？
ja.hint:
例：スポーツ／趣味／英語で話す／旅行。
型：I want to try ____. / I feel nervous because ____. / My first small step is ____.
ja.sample: I want to try speaking English in public. I feel nervous because I might make mistakes. My first small step is to practice every day.

zh.prompt:
小螞蟻大叫「跳！」，雖然不確定會怎樣，還是勇敢嘗試。你有沒有一件想試的新事物，雖然有點緊張？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你想嘗試什麼？
2) 你為什麼緊張？
3) 你可以先做哪個小步驟？
zh.hint:
方向：運動／興趣／用英文說話／旅行。
句型：I want to try ____. / I feel nervous because ____. / My first small step is ____.
zh.sample: I want to try speaking English with strangers. I feel nervous because I may not understand them. My first small step is to learn ten useful sentences.

title: I Am Floating
prompt:
The ant repeats, "I am floating." How do you feel when you are completely relaxed, like you are floating? Describe a place or moment.

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) Where are you?
2) What are you doing?
3) How do you feel?
hint:
Ideas: a holiday, a quiet place, music, nature.
Sentence starters: I feel relaxed when I am ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
sample: I feel relaxed when I lie on the grass and look at the sky. I watch the clouds move slowly. It makes me feel calm and light.

ja.prompt:
アリは「I am floating.」と言います。あなたが完全にリラックスするのはどんな時ですか？場所や瞬間を描写してください。

英語で3文：
1) どこにいますか？
2) 何をしていますか？
3) どんな気持ちですか？
ja.hint:
例：休暇／静かな場所／音楽／自然。
型：I feel relaxed when I am ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
ja.sample: I feel relaxed when I sit in a quiet room. I listen to soft music. It makes me feel calm.

zh.prompt:
故事裡，小螞蟻一直說「我正在漂浮」。你在什麼時候會覺得超放鬆，像整個人輕飄飄的？描述一個地方或時刻。

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你在哪裡？
2) 你在做什麼？
3) 你感覺如何？
zh.hint:
方向：假期／安靜的地方／音樂／大自然。
句型：I feel relaxed when I am ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
zh.sample: I feel relaxed when I sit by the ocean. I listen to the waves and breathe slowly. It makes me feel peaceful.

title: Almost There
prompt:
Sometimes we feel "almost there" but not finished yet. What is something you are working on now, and what is your next small step?

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What are you working on?
2) Why is it hard?
3) What is your next small step?
hint:
Ideas: a project, a habit, a skill you are learning.
Sentence starters: I am working on ____. / It is hard because ____. / My next step is ____.
sample: I am working on improving my English. It is hard because I don’t have much time. My next step is to practice speaking for ten minutes every day.

ja.prompt:
「もう少しでできそう（almost there）」でもまだ終わっていない時があります。今取り組んでいることと、次の小さな一歩は何ですか？

英語で3文：
1) 何に取り組んでいますか？
2) なぜ難しいですか？
3) 次の小さな一歩は？
ja.hint:
例：プロジェクト／習慣／学んでいる技能。
型：I am working on ____. / It is hard because ____. / My next step is ____.
ja.sample: I am working on learning English. It is hard because I get busy. My next step is to practice every day.

zh.prompt:
有時候我們覺得「快到了」，但還沒完成。你現在正在努力的事情是什麼？你可以做的下一個小步是什麼？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你正在努力什麼？
2) 為什麼有點難？
3) 下一個小步是什麼？
zh.hint:
方向：專案／習慣／正在學的技能。
句型：I am working on ____. / It is hard because ____. / My next step is ____.
zh.sample: I am working on exercising regularly. It is hard because I feel tired after work. My next step is to walk for 15 minutes every day.

title: You Made It!
prompt:
In the story, someone says, "You made it!" Think about a time you wanted to say this to yourself or someone else. What happened?

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) Who was it (you or someone)?
2) What was the challenge?
3) What happened in the end?
hint:
Ideas: a race, an exam, a project, or a hard day.
Sentence starters: I wanted to say “You made it!” when ____. / It was hard because ____. / In the end, ____.
sample: I wanted to say “You made it!” to my friend after her first marathon. It was hard because she felt very tired. In the end, she finished and smiled proudly.

ja.prompt:
物語で「You made it!」と言う場面があります。あなたが自分や誰かにそう言いたくなった時はありますか？

英語で3文：
1) 誰に言いたかったですか？
2) どんな挑戦でしたか？
3) 最後どうなりましたか？
ja.hint:
例：レース／試験／プロジェクト／大変な一日。
型：I wanted to say “You made it!” when ____. / It was hard because ____. / In the end, ____.
ja.sample: I wanted to say “You made it!” to my friend after a race. It was hard for her. In the end, she finished and felt proud.

zh.prompt:
故事裡有人對小螞蟻說「You made it! 你做到了！」想一想，你有沒有想對自己或別人說這句話的時候？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你想對誰說？
2) 他/你遇到什麼挑戰？
3) 最後發生什麼事？
zh.hint:
方向：比賽／考試／專案／撐過很累的一天。
句型：I wanted to say “You made it!” when ____. / It was hard because ____. / In the end, ____.
zh.sample: I wanted to say “You made it!” to myself after a busy week. It was hard because I had many tasks. In the end, I finished everything and rested.

title: Don’t Give Up
prompt:
The ant has a problem, but he does not give up. What helps you not to give up when something is hard?

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What is something hard for you?
2) What helps you keep going?
3) What do you tell yourself?
hint:
Ideas: support from people, your goal, your feelings.
Sentence starters: When ____ is hard, I ____. / It helps when ____. / I tell myself ____.
sample: When studying is hard, I take a short break and try again. It helps when I talk to a friend. I tell myself, “Just one more step.”

ja.prompt:
アリはあきらめずに挑戦し続けます。あなたが大変な時、あきらめないために何が助けになりますか？

英語で3文：
1) 何が大変ですか？
2) 何が助けになりますか？
3) 自分に何と言いますか？
ja.hint:
例：人のサポート／目標／気持ち。
型：When ____ is hard, I ____. / It helps when ____. / I tell myself ____.
ja.sample: When something is hard, I take a break and try again. It helps when I talk to a friend. I tell myself, “Keep going.”

zh.prompt:
小螞蟻遇到困難也不放棄。當你覺得事情很難時，什麼可以幫你不要放棄？

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 你覺得什麼事情很難？
2) 什麼能幫你繼續？
3) 你會對自己說什麼？
zh.hint:
方向：別人的支持／心中的目標／完成後的感覺。
句型：When ____ is hard, I ____. / It helps when ____. / I tell myself ____.
zh.sample: When work is hard, I make a small plan. It helps when my family supports me. I tell myself, “I can do it.”

title: Feeling Safe at Home
prompt:
At the end, the ant is home and safe. What makes you feel “at home” and safe? It can be a place, a person, or an activity.

Answer in 3 short sentences:
1) What is it (place/person/activity)?
2) What do you do there (or with it)?
3) How does it make you feel?
hint:
Ideas: your room, family, friends, a hobby.
Sentence starters: I feel safe when I ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
sample: I feel safe when I sit in my room. I listen to my favorite music and read a book. It makes me feel calm and at home.

ja.prompt:
最後にアリは家に着き、安全で安心します。あなたが「家みたいに安心できる」と感じるのは何ですか？場所・人・活動でもOKです。

英語で3文：
1) それは何ですか？
2) そこで何をしますか？
3) どんな気持ちになりますか？
ja.hint:
例：自分の部屋／家族／友達／趣味。
型：I feel safe when I ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
ja.sample: I feel safe when I am in my room. I listen to music and rest. It makes me feel calm.

zh.prompt:
故事最後，小螞蟻回到家，覺得安全又安心。對你來說，什麼會讓你有「在家」的安全感？可以是地方、人或活動。

用 3 句英文回答：
1) 是什麼？
2) 你會做什麼？
3) 你感覺如何？
zh.hint:
方向：自己的房間／家人／朋友／興趣。
句型：I feel safe when I ____. / I usually ____. / It makes me feel ____.
zh.sample: I feel safe when I am with my family. We eat dinner and talk together. It makes me feel warm and relaxed.
